title: What are some bittersweet, touching, sad songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Someone like you by Van Morrison. Someday Soon by Basia Bulat. Thoughts on Fire by Ria Mae. Song for Ireland by Mary Black. All the Pretty Girls by Kaleo. I can't make you love me by Bon Iver. Amen, Hey that's no way to say goodbye, or really any song by Leonard Cohen. And I have to include a reggae song so I'm gonna recommend Rockaway by Beres Hammond. There are so many great songs. Keep on dancing!
